title: Voicemail Friday's - The Smells
description:
Jalen Rose and David Jacoby use their podcast exclusive time to do another 'Voicemail Friday' talking everything from players who smelled while playing and if it is wrong to take a business call on the toilet.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: J&J: We Answer All Of Your Questions From Talking Business While Doing Business To Smelly Players
